recipesJson.name: TOC'S Cookie Cereal (AKA Cookie Crunch)
recipesJson.author: VapingCrimson
recipesJson.description: So I'm going to call it like it is.  I love Kookie Krunch and my local vape shop doesn't sell it anymore so I set out to get as close as I could to that recipe.  This is it.  For me it's better than the original store bought, to you it may not be, and that is how things work with so-called clones.

reviews.text: I like it. Creamy with a cookie/cereal/grain note. Never had the liquid you were inspired by. Very enjoyable, kind of get a over soggy cookie in milk. Vaping at 40 watts in a rdl set up.
